historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-627.7.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-27, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-621.02.

DC CODE § 1-626.07

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: An employee is eligible to participate in the deferred compensation plan under § 1-626.05(2) upon commencement of employment with the District.
An employee is eligible to participate in the defined contribution plan under § 1-626.05(3) upon the completion of 1 year of employment with the District.
